comments: This professor is the worst professor I\'ve had. He hates questions, even if it\'s something you\'ve never gone over. There will be questions on the test you\'ve never seen. If you take this professor prepare to work extremely hard just to make a C.

He gets confused and changes the numbers in sample problems without realizing that he is doing it. To him there is only one right answer, even if the problem can be approached from a different angle. Very focused on procedures, if the procedure is not followed the answer is wrong no matter what. Changes due date without notice, so do work day given
